channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博消息的种子

item.title: "如果你穿着袜子睡觉，你就是个神经病。"这一日益普遍的睡前建议引发了争议。
item.description: “If you sleep in socks you’re a psychopath.” The increasingly common bedtime advice is kicking up controversy. on.wsj.com/48NJKcF on.wsj.com/48NJKcF

item.title: 国际足联（FIFA）宣布，大都会人寿球场（MetLife Stadium）将举办世界最大体育赛事的最后一场比赛，美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）喷气机队（Jets）和巨人队（Giants）的主场在洛杉矶和达拉斯的竞标中胜出。
item.description: FIFA announced that MetLife Stadium will stage the final match of the world’s biggest sporting event, as the home of the NFL’s Jets and Giants edged out bids from Los Angeles and Dallas on.wsj.com/3SIUALu on.wsj.com/3SIUALu

item.title: 对于 50 多岁的男性来说，生活中的些许挫折和打击会让成为父亲的经历更加丰富多彩
item.description: For men in their 50s, being buffeted and banged up a little by life can make becoming a father a richer experience on.wsj.com/3uoeZMj on.wsj.com/3uoeZMj

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：中国和印度仍然占世界移民的很大一部分。如果这些国家的繁荣和稳定是有保障的，那么为什么这么多人急于离开呢？
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Both China and India continue to account for a large portion of the world’s emigrants. If these countries’ prosperity and stability are assured, then why are so many eager to leave? asks @dhume. on.wsj.com/3Ov5YrT

item.title: 丹-尼尔（Dan Neil）写道："2024 年款路虎卫士 130 Outbound 给人的第一印象令人惊叹--内部清新现代，外部粗犷豪迈。
item.description: The 2024 Land Rover Defender 130 Outbound makes a marvelous first impression—fresh and modern inside, bold and brawny outside, writes Dan Neil on.wsj.com/3HNXacE on.wsj.com/3HNXacE

item.title: 传统上会成为房主的美国人转而开始租房。他们正在催生新型社区，改变储蓄模式，甚至购买不同的灯具。
item.description: Americans who would traditionally be homeowners are instead renting. They’re sparking new kinds of neighborhoods, changing savings patterns—and even buying different light fixtures. on.wsj.com/3UsgeVl on.wsj.com/3UsgeVl

item.title: 谁说简单不能奢华？伦敦大厨埃德-威尔逊（Ed Wilson）分享了苹果酒炖青口贝、培根和大蒜面包的冬季晚餐。
item.description: Who says simple can't be luxurious? London chef Ed Wilson shares a convivial winter supper of cider-braised mussels, bacon and garlic bread. on.wsj.com/4bADrLs on.wsj.com/4bADrLs

item.title: 我们毁了性爱吗？五位作家提出了一个问题：在人类最亲密的行为方面，社会是否已经迷失了方向？
item.description: Have we ruined sex? Five writers ask whether society has lost its way when it comes to the most intimate of human acts. on.wsj.com/3vXtDdY on.wsj.com/3vXtDdY

item.title: 中西部小城吸引了从洛杉矶到奥斯汀的购房者
item.description: The small, Midwestern city luring home buyers from Los Angeles to Austin on.wsj.com/42pLgPU on.wsj.com/42pLgPU

item.title: 以下是《华尔街日报》头版的早期报道
item.description: Here is an early look at the front page of The Wall Street Journal on.wsj.com/3ud5Fer

item.title: 在格莱美奖颁奖典礼上，泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）成为四次获得年度最佳专辑奖的第一人，并发布了一个令人惊喜的专辑消息。Billie Eilish 凭借《芭比娃娃》原声大碟中的 "What Was I Made For "获得年度歌曲奖。
item.description: At the Grammys, Taylor Swift became the first person to win album of the year four times—and dropped a surprise album announcement. Billie Eilish won song of the year for “What Was I Made For” from the “Barbie” soundtrack. on.wsj.com/3SJ2t3A on.wsj.com/3SJ2t3A

item.title: 由唐纳德-格洛弗和玛雅-厄斯金主演的新电视剧《史密斯夫妇》与电影《布拉德-皮特和安吉丽娜-朱莉》完全不同。
item.description: A new “Mr. & Mrs. Smith” TV series, starring Donald Glover and Maya Erskine, intends to be nothing like the movie that captured the real-life heat between future couple Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie on.wsj.com/3uklIqG on.wsj.com/3uklIqG

item.title: 2024 年格莱美奖红毯上的最佳造型，包括泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）和奥利维亚-罗德里戈（Olivia Rodrigo）的惊艳造型
item.description: The best looks from the 2024 Grammy Awards red carpet, including stunning looks from Taylor Swift to Olivia Rodrigo on.wsj.com/42pKLFg on.wsj.com/42pKLFg

item.title: 受到在天堂般的夏威夷实现置业梦想的诱惑，岛上居民和大陆移民纷纷涌向夏威夷基拉韦厄火山阴影下的一个地区
item.description: Lured by a shot at attainable homeownership in paradise, island dwellers and mainland transplants alike have been flocking to an area in the shadow of Hawaii’s Kilauea volcano on.wsj.com/3Snwtk9 on.wsj.com/3Snwtk9

item.title: 从 "Wordle "到 "Gordle"，游戏迷们为了不错过每天的游戏，从设置凌晨 12:01 的闹钟到度假时躲在厕所隔间里，可谓煞费苦心。"连败对我来说是一种情感伤害"。
item.description: Fans of games from "Wordle" to "Gordle" go to great lengths so they don’t miss playing daily, from setting alarms at 12:01 a.m. to hiding in a bathroom stall on vacation. "It’s emotionally damaging for me when I lose a streak." on.wsj.com/4960uvR on.wsj.com/4960uvR

item.title: 在即将举行的俄罗斯总统大选投票中，普京的连任几乎板上钉钉，获准参选的候选人不知道自己应该做些什么
item.description: With Vladimir Putin’s re-election all but assured in a coming Russian presidential vote, candidates permitted to run aren’t sure what they should be doing on.wsj.com/48S5oMV on.wsj.com/48S5oMV

item.title: 多年来，西方公司一直在抱怨中国的山寨。现在，山寨者正向中国公司袭来。
item.description: For years, Western companies complained about Chinese copycats. Now, copycats are coming for Chinese companies. on.wsj.com/3unggDr on.wsj.com/3unggDr

item.title: 华丽七巨头 "中有五家公司季度业绩强劲--但投资者对奖励哪家公司却很挑剔
item.description: Five of the “Magnificent Seven” companies turned in strong quarterly results—but investors are being picky about which ones they reward on.wsj.com/3OuOFXZ on.wsj.com/3OuOFXZ

item.title: 牛排馆是一种时尚。比起牛排本身，食客们开始更关注牛排馆的 "嗞嗞 "声。
item.description: Steakhouse vibes are in style. Diners are starting to care more about the sizzle of a steakhouse than the steak itself. on.wsj.com/48XuDgX on.wsj.com/48XuDgX

item.description: Topped with whatever your Valentine desires, this homemade chocolate will score you major points on.wsj.com/49nFDUq on.wsj.com/49nFDUq
